title: Are you Looking for club to enjoy ?
body:
Hi guys I just  recently made a club, am just looking for me members <3 as I am solo player in this game, (it means yeah no friends :( ) but hopefully I can find some through this club ^.^ Lets have some fun. If you are also looking for a club to enjoy please join mine :) 

add me in game or leave ur game name and I will invite u {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
